text: Zachary Levi Pugh known as Zachary Levi, (born September 29, 1980) is an American actor. He is best known for playing Chuck Bartowski in the television series Chuck and Captain Marvel in Shazam! and its upcoming sequel Shazam! Fury of the Gods. He has also acted in Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel and Tangled. Levi was born in Lake Charles, Louisiana. Levi played Captain Marvel in the 2019 DC Extended Universe movie Shazam! ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from Louisiana
title: Zachary Levi
